channel.title: Survivor on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Survivor on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Why Jeff Probst Finally Let Mike White Return to ‘Survivor’ (and if He’d Make a ‘White Lotus’ Cameo)
item.description: The Emmy-winning (and recently nominated) host and EP dishes on ‘The White Lotus’ creator’s buzzy casting for season 50, and if he’d ever make an appearance in White’s beloved HBO show.

item.title: Why Jeff Probst Finally Let Mike White Return to ‘Survivor’ (and if He’d Make a ‘White Lotus’ Cameo)
item.description: The Emmy-winning (and recently nominated) host and EP dishes on ‘The White Lotus’ creator’s buzzy casting for season 50, and if he’d ever make an appearance in White’s beloved HBO show.

item.title: Jeff Probst on What It Takes to Outwit, Outplay and Outlast His Emmys Competition
item.description: The longtime ‘Survivor’ host and EP reflects on his recent Emmy nom, why the reality show has found a resurgence in awards recognition and Mike White’s looming season 50 appearance.

item.title: Jeff Probst on What It Takes to Outwit, Outplay and Outlast His Emmys Competition
item.description: The longtime ‘Survivor’ host and EP reflects on his recent Emmy nom, why the reality show has found a resurgence in awards recognition and Mike White’s looming season 50 appearance.

item.title: Watson Moves onto CBS’ Fall Lineup, ‘FBI’ Spinoff ‘CIA’ Pushed to Midseason
item.description: The network has also set its fall premiere dates, with the bulk of the schedule rolling out in October.
